instruction: Kurudziro Yekuti VaMnangagwa Vatonge Kusvika 2030 Yokonzera Mutauro muNyika('The Recommendation That Mnangagwa Rule Until 2030 Will Cause Language In The World')
output: Kurudziro yekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa varambe vari pachigaro kusvika muna 2030 kana kuti “ED 2030” iri kuramba ichikura uye kupararira nematunhu akawanda.Makurukota ehurumende, mapoka anotsigira bato reZanu PF, pamwe naivo VaMnangagwa ndevamwe vari kuendesa mberi kurudziro iyi kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richiti vanofanirwa kutonga kusvika muna 2028 chete.Nyaya iyi inonziwo yaunza kusagadzikana kukuru mubato reZanu PF sezvo vamwe vari kunzi vari kuzviramba asi vachitya kubuda pachena.Asi vamwe vari kunze kwebato iri kusanganisira VaTwanda Dzvokora, avo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, vanoti ivo nevamwe vana veZimbabwe vachaita zvose zviri pamutemo kumisa VaMnangagwa nevari kuvatsigira kuti vasaramba vari panyanga kudarika 2028 panopera temu yavo yepiri.VaDzvokora vanoti vana veZimbabwe vakabuda pachena muna 2023 nehuwandu hwavo kuti havacha hutungamiri hwaVaMnangagwa, nekudaro havangadi kupinda nesri kwemba kusina musuwo, vachiti zvese zviri kuitika ndezvekupenga chaiko.Vanoti zviri kuitwa nemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nevamwe vavo izvi hazvina kusiyana nekutamba nemuswe wembada, asi kana yakavhunduka hauone kwainokukanda.Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Masimba Mavaza, vanoti havaoni chakaipa kuti VaMnangagwa varambe vari panyanga kana vachiri kudiwa zvavo nevanhu uye vanotisloganchete haivandudze mitemo yenyika nekudaro hapana chakaipa pazviri.Vanoti zvakare bumbiro remitemo rinopa mwana weZimbabwe wese kodzero yekutaura zvaanoda, nekudaro vari kuti “ED 2030” ava ikodzero yavo, kana chete vasiri kutuka vamwe nekukurudzira mhirizhonga.Doctor Mavaza vanoti kana bato ravo richida zvekuvandudza mutemo wekuti VaMnangagwa varambe vachitonga, rinotevera gwara rekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu uye harina chinorimisa sezvo riine huwandu muparamende.Varamba mashoko ekuti mubato reZanu PF hamuchona kuwirirana nekuda kwenyaya iyi, vachiti manyepo nekuti haisati yambokurukurwa nezvayo mungave muCentral Committee kana mu Politburo.Hurukuro naDoctor Masimba Mavaza pamwe naVaTawanda Dzvokora('The call for President Emmerson Mnangagwa to remain in office until 2030 or ED 2030 continues to grow and spread in many regions. Government ministers, groups that support the Zanu PF party, as well as Mr. Mnangagwa are among those who are advancing this call even though the constitution The law says that they should only rule until 2028. This issue is also said to have caused great unrest in the Zanu PF party as some are said to be denying it but are afraid to come out publicly. they will do everything legally to stop Mr. Mnangagwa and those who support him so that they do not remain in power beyond 2028 when his second term ends. Mr. Dzvokora says that the children of Zimbabwe have come out in 2023 with their majority that they will not want the leadership of Mr. Mnangagwa, therefore they would not want to enter the back of the house without a door, saying that everything that is happening is really crazy. They say what the president and his colleagues are doing is not different from playing with a leopard's tail, but when it is frightened you cannot see where it is going. But a political analyst who is a member of Zanu PF, Doctor Masimba Mavaza, says that they do not see anything wrong with Mnangagwa continuing to be in power if he is still loved by the people and only sloganeering does not improve the laws. of the country and therefore there is nothing wrong with it. They also say that the constitution gives every child of Zimbabwe the right to express what they want, therefore they are saying that ED 2030 is their right, as long as they are not insulting others and inciting violence. Doctor Mavaza says that if his party wants to improve the law so that Mr. Mnangagwa continues to rule , follows the policy of hearing people's opinions and there is no stopping it as it has a majority in the parliament. They rejected the claims that the Zanu PF party will not agree because of this issue, saying it is a lie because it has never been discussed either in the Central Committee or in the Politburo.  Interview with Dr. Masimba Mavaza and Mr. Tawanda Dzvokora')

instruction: Vavhoti muAmerica Vane Maonero Akasiyana Pakuwanikwa kwaVaTrump Vaine Mhosva('Voters in America Have Different Views on Trump's Conviction')
output: VaDonald Trump vari kutanga svondo rino kutsvaga rutsigiro semunhu wekutanga aimbova mutungamiri weAmerica kukwikwidza sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekuwanikwa aine mhosva nematare.Vatsigiri vaVaTrump vakamira panze pemba yavo, inonzi Trump Towers, kuNew York, kwapera zuva rimwe chete kubva vabatwa nemosva makumi matatu neina dzekunyora zvekunyepa pamagwaro emabhizimisi avo nechinangwa chekuda kuti vavhoterwe kuti vatungamire nyika muna 2016 asi vachityora mutemo.Munzvimbo yeChelsea muguta reNew York, muvhoti Nicholas Warner anoti kubatwa nemhosva kwaVaTrump chinhu chakaipa sezvo America ichida kuti VaTrump vadzoke pachigaro kwemamwe makore mana.VaWarner vanoti, Pavakanga vari mutungamiri wenyika makore mana apfuura, zvatiri kuona zvichiitika, zvakanga zvisipo. " Vatiwo, "Ikozvino pane nyaya yehondo, ukuwo hupfumi hwananga kumawere, zvinhu zviri kudhura. Saka ndinongoda kuti adzoke agadzirise zvinhu samuzvinabhizimisi.”Muguta reEllicott City, mudunhu reMaryland, muvhoti Arkady Lapidus, anoti zvinotaurwa naVaTrump zvekuti kutongwa kwavo kwakakonzerwa naVaBiden hazvina kunakira bato ravo remaRepublicans nenyika, vachiti, “Hapana chakanaka chinobuda apa kusvika bato iri rabvisa VaTrump."Vatizve, "Tinovimba nesarudzo. Tinogashira zvinobuda mumatare edzimhosva. Tinovimba nevanobetsera vatongi, kana kutonga nyaya nekuti tiri zvizvarwa zveAmerica. Handivhoteri bato reRepublican kusvika ratanga kuremekedza zvatinotarisira sevanhu vemuAmerica, kuremekedza mutemo nezvimwe."Muvhoti Margaret Barnes, wemudunhu reMaryland, anoti kunyangwe vakawanikwa vaine mhosva, VaTrump varinani pana VaBiden, vachiti, “Biden haaiti seanovimbika, anongotaura zvekunyepa achida kuita semunhu mukuru akanaka asi tichiona hedu kuti handizvo zvaari."Amai Barnes vatiwo, "Handitende zvaanotaura. Haavimbiki. Asi kunyangwe Trump vachiwedzeredza mune zvaanotaura uye kunyangwe zvimwe zvavanotaura zvichitsamwisa, ndinotenderana naye kazhinji kacho.”Mudunhu reColorado, muvhoti Luda Golodnykh anoti kuwanikwa kwaVaTrump vaine mhosva kwakafanira, vachiti vanovimba kuti kuchavhiringa kutsvaka kwavo rutsigiro, vachiti, “Matauriro anoita VaTrump pamusoro pevanhukadzi, nzira yavanobata nayo dzimwe nyika, matauriro avanoita pamusoro pevanhu vanotsvaka hupoteri, ivo vakaroora mumwe akabva kune imwe nyika ndinongoti “aiwa, zvirikuitika kwavari zvaifanirwa kunge zvakaitika kare.”Mudunhu reNevada, muvhoti Keith Dayton, anoti zvakabuda mudare hazvisi kuzochinja kuvhota kwake.Dayton anoti, “Ndicharamba ndichivhotera VaTrump. Zvose zviri kuitika ndezvemanyepo." Vatiwo, " Ndinonzwa kunyarira nyika yedu. Haasi munhu wekuti ndingatandara naye tichinwa hwahwa naye asi handiyo nyaya yacho.”Mudunhu rePennsylvania, rimwe rematunhu risina kwarakarerekera, mumwe muvhoti anotsigira VaTrump, Jeffrey Nesbitt, anoti zvakabuda mumatare zvinogona kubatsira VaTrump.VaNesbitt vanoti, “Ndinofunga kuti zvirinani kuti vanhu vemu America vasavhotere VaTrump nevatsigiri vavo musarudzo. Asi ndinoona sekuti zvakabuda mumatare zvichakonzera kuti vatsigiri vaVaTrump vaende kunovhoto nehuwandu hwavo.”Ongororo yakaitwa neReuters yakabatana neIpsos inoratidza kuti vavhoti zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana (90%) zvenhengo dzebato remaRepublican vanotsigira VaTrump.Asi zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvasara apa ndizvo zvinonzi zvinogona kukonzera kuti vakundwe musarudzo.Izvi zvinokonzerwa nekuti hapana musiyano mukuru pakati perutsigiro rwuna VaTrump naVaBiden nekudaro kuti munhu akunde anotofanira kutsigirwa zvakasimba nevavhoti vagara vachivhotera bato rake.('Mr. Donald Trump is beginning this week to seek support as the first former president of the United States to contest the presidential election after being found guilty by the courts. instruction: VaTrump Voshandisa Kusungwa Kwavo neMhosva Kutsvaga Mari yeSarudzo Zvoitwawo naVaBiden Vari Kuvashora('Mr. Trump Uses His Criminal Imprisonment To Seek Funds For The Election And Mr. Biden Is Criticizing Him')
output: Vaimbova mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, nemusi weSvondo vakataura pamusoro pekuti vanogona kutongerwa kugara mujeri mwedzi unouya zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwavo vaine mhosva yekunyepa pamagwaro emabizimisi avo.Kubatwa nemhosva uku kwave kushandiswa naivo VaTrump naVaBiden mukutsvaka rutsigiro vachipa manyavi vatsigiri vavo.Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti kukwezva vavhoti vasina kwavakarerekera kuchanetsa.Vangangove zvavo mutungamiri weAmerica wekutanga kuwanikwa aine mhosva, asi rimwe remagweta avo, VaWill Scharf, rinoti mbiri yaVaDonald Trump haisi kudzikira mavari kutsvaka rutsigiro.VaScharf vanoti, “Chikwata chiri kutsvagira vaTrump rubatsiro chakaita zvisati zvamboonekwa munhoorondo yekutsvaga mari yesarudzo, kusanganisira kuunganidza mari kubva kuzviuru nezviuru vaibatsira kekutanga mukati memaawa makumi maviri nemana kubva zvakapiwa mutongo. Ndinofunga kuti vanhu vemuAmerica vanoona mutongo uyu sezvawaive. Tave netarisiro izere kuti patichaipikisa, tichaita kuti nyaya iyi iraswe nematare.”Paitongwa nyaya iyi, vachuchusi vakapikisa vachiti VaTrump vakanyepa pamagwaro emabhizimisi avo kuitira kuti vawane kuvhoterwa musarudzo iyo vakakunda.Vachitaura panhepfenyuro yeABC, Gavhuna vedunhu reMaryland vari vebato remaDemocrats, VaWes Moore, vanoti kubatwa nemhosva kwaVa Trump hakuvabatsiri mune zvematongerwo enyika, zvikuru muvavhoti vechitema.Gavhuna Moore vanoti, “Zvichange zviri mundangariro dzevagari vose ndezve kuve nemunhu, kuve nemutungamiri wenyika sewatinaye pari zvino VaBiden, uyo akatarisa mune remangwana redu.”Vari pachirongwa chakaburitswa neSvondo cheFox And Friends, VaTrump vakataura pamusoro pemukana wekuti musi waChikunguru 11 vanogona kutongerwa kugara mujeri kana kuve muhusungwa vari pamba pavo.VaTrump vakati, “Handizivi kuti vanhu vangazvitambira. Munoziva, handina chokwadi chekuti veruzhinji vangazvitambira. Ndinofunga kuti zvingaomera veruzhinji kuzvitambira, munoziva, tinenge tasvika panguva yekuti zvinenge zvisisatambiriki.”Chikwata chiri kutsvagira VaBiden rutsigiro chakaburitsa padandemutande re “X”, iro raimbonzi Twitter, hurukuro yaVaTrump yacho iine mashoko anoti “Nyakubatwa nemhosva Trump, oti pachaita mhirizhonga kana akatongerwa kupika ari pamba pake.”Vachitaura pahurukuro yavakashandisa dandemutande re Skype, vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika pachikoro chepamusorosoro, che University of Chicago, Muzvinafundo Susan Stokes, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo VaBiden vachitarisirwa kuramba vachitaura mashoko avo ekuti hapana munhu ari pamusoro pemutemo, kutsvaga kwavo rutsigiro kunotarisirwa kuwedzera kushandiswa kubatwa nemhosva kwaVaTrump sechombo.Muzvinafundo Stokes vanoti, “Chido chavo chekushandisa mari yavo nemasimba mukuda kuti vasatongwa, unotarisira zvakadaro kubva kwavari.”Muzvinafundo Stokes vanowedzera vachiti kunze kwekufadza vatsigiri vavo, sangano rinotsvakira VaTrump rutsigiro rinofanira kuchinja zvavanotaura kuti vawane vamwe vavhoti.Vakati, “Pamwe madzimai emumisha iri pedyo nemaguta vasati vasarudza wekutsigira musarudzo yemuna Mbudzi vanganyengetedzwa kuti kubatwa nemhosva kwaVaTrump hakuna zvakunoreva.”Vese vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika vari kutarisirwa kuenderera mberi nekukwezva vavhoti vaya vasati vafunga wekutewera mwedzi uno, pakamirirwa gakava rekutanga, kana kutidebate, riri kuitwa musi waChikumi 27.Nyaya Yatumirwa NaVeronica Balderas('The former president of the United States, Mr. Donald Trump, on Sunday said that he could be sentenced to prison next month following his conviction for lying on the documents of his businesses. This conviction has been used by Mr. Trump and Mr. Biden to seek support and give shame to their supporters. But political analysts say that it will attract voters. I think the American people see this verdict as it was. We have full hope that when we protest, we will have this case dismissed by the courts. When this case was being tried, the prosecutors protested saying that Mr. Trump lied on his business documents in order to get the vote in the election which he won. Speaking on the ABC radio, the Governor of the state of Maryland who belongs to the Democrats, Mr. Wes Moore, said that he was caught Mr. Trump's crime does not help him in politics, especially among black voters. Speaking on Skype, Professor Susan Stokes, who teaches politics at the University of Chicago, says that although Mr. Biden is expected to keep saying his words that no one is above the law, his search for support is expected to increase when he is convicted. to Mr. Trump as a weapon. instruction: VaMnangagwa Voita Musangano naVaPutin Mangwana('Mr. Mnangagwa to hold a meeting with Mr. Putin tomorrow')
output: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa mangwana kuita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika yeRussia VaVladimir Putin kumucheto kwemusangano wechimakumi maviri nenomwe kana kuti 27th St. Petersburg International Economic forum (SPIEF).Kunze kwavaMnangagwa vamwe vatungamiri vanenge vari kumusangano uyu vanosanganisira wenyika yeBolivia VaLuis Arce.Muzinda waVaPutin weKremlin ndiwo wazivisa kuti vachaita musangano naVaMnangagwa.VaMnangagwa vanogara vachiti hukama neRussia hwakakosha kubva munguva yehondo yechimurenga.Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika Doctor Frederick Shava asi vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.Asi vanokokera Zanu-PF mudare repamende VaPupurai Togarepi vati kudyidzana neRussia kwakakosha zvikuru uye kwakatangira munguva yehondo.('President Emmerson Mnangagwa is expected to hold a meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin on the sidelines of the 27th St. Petersburg International Economic Forum (SPIEF). instruction: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanosangana neMutungamiri weSouth Korea VaYoon Suk Yoel Pamberi peMusangano weKorea-Africa Summit('President Mnangagwa Meets South Korean President Yoon Suk Yoel Ahead of the Korea-Africa Summit')
output: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vari kuSouth Korea kwavari kupinda musangano weKorea-Africa Summit uri kutanga neChipiri, vasangana nemutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaYoon Suk Yoel muSeoul.Vatungamiri vaviri ava vakurukura hukama kweZimbabwe neSouth Korea uye nzira dzekusimbisa kudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi.Vachinyora padandemutande ravo re “X” iro raimbonzi Twitter, VaMnangagwa vati vachanyorerana zvibvumirano zvakasiyana nenyika iyi.Mutungamiri wenyika vaperekedzwa kumusangano uyu negurukota rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Doctor Frederick Shava pamwe nemumiriri weZimbabwe kuSouth Korea, VaStewart Nyakotyo.Zimbabwe yagara ine nhoroondo yekudyidzana zvakanyanya nenyika yeNorth Korea kudarika South Korea kubva kumazuva ehondo yerusununguko pamwe nekuumbwa kwechikwata chemauto che 5th Brigade, icho chinonzi ndicho chaitungamira mukushungurudzwa nekuuraiwa kwevanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri munguva yegukurahundi mumatunhu eMatebeleland neMidlands.South Korea ndeimwe yenyika dzinonzi dzakabudirira mudunhu reAsia.Musangano weKorea-Africa uri kuitwa kwemazuva maviri muguta guru reSouth Korea, reSeoul, uye nyika makumi mana nesere dzemuAfrica dziri kupinda musangano uyu.Nyanzvi yezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa pachikoro chepamusorosoro cheTswane University of Technology muSouth Africa, Muzvinafundo Munyaradzi Ricky Mukonza, vanoti kuwirirana kungaumbwe pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Korea kunogona kukonzerawo kusafara kwedzimwe nyika dzisingawirirani neSouth Korea asi dzichidyidzana neZimbabwe.('The President of the country, Mr. Emmerson Mnangagwa, who is in South Korea where he is attending the Korea-Africa Summit which starts on Tuesday, met with the President of this country, Mr. Yoon Suk Yoel in Seoul. of X which used to be called Twitter, Mr. Mnangagwa said that they will sign different agreements with this country. The President was accompanied to the meeting by the Minister of Economy, Professor Mthuli Ncube, the Minister of International Relations, Doctor Frederick Shava and the Zimbabwean Ambassador to South Korea, Mr. Stewart Nyakotyo. Zimbabwe has always had a history of cooperation more with North Korea than South Korea since the days of the war of independence and the formation of the 5th Brigade, which is said to have been responsible for the torture and killing of more than 20,000 people during the Gukurahundi region in Matebeleland and the Midlands. South Korea is one of the most prosperous countries in Asia. The Korea-Africa meeting is held for two days in the capital of South Korea, Seoul, and 48 African countries are participating in this meeting. A political expert teaching at the Tswane University of Technology in South Africa, Professor Munyaradzi Ricky Mukonza, says that a compromise that may be formed between Zimbabwe and South Korea may also cause unhappiness in other countries countries that do not agree with South Korea but cooperate with Zimbabwe.')

instruction: Zvichitevera Kuziviswa kweZvakabuda muSarudzo muSouth Africa Tarisiro Yave paMapato Achabatana muKuumba Hurumende yeMubatanidzwa('Following the Announcement of the Election Results in South Africa, Hopes Are on the Parties to Unite in Forming a Coalition Government')
output: Zvichitevera kuziviswa zviri pamutemo kwezvakabuda musarudzo dzemuSouth Africa nezuro neIndependent Electoral Commission, izvo zvinoratidza kuti bato riri kutonga reAfrican National Congress, ANC, rakakundikana kuwana zvikamu zvemavhoti zvinodarika makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvinoita kuti riumbe hurumende riri roga, nyaya hombe yave yave yekuti bato iri richabatana nebato ripi kana kuti nemapato api?Mapato makuru anotarisirwa kubatana neANC mukuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa anosanganisira Democratic Alliance kana kuti DA, uMkhonto we Sizwe kana kuti MK, Economic Freedom Fighters kana kuti EFF, nemamwe madiki.Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaKudakwashe Bandama, avo vari muSouth Africa, vanoti zvakabuda musarudzo idzi handizvo zvaitarisirwa nevakawanda zvekuti pfungwa yehurumende yemubatanidzwa yakanga isimo mupfungwa dzevakawanda.Asi vanoti bato reDA pamwe nemamwe akawana zvigaro ane mukana wekupinda muhurumende yemubatanidzwa neANC, asi chikuru chichange chichitariswa ndechekuti munyaya dzekutungamira munenge muchiwirirana zvakadii.Asi vamwewo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti bato reDA ragara richishoropodza matongero ehurumende yeANC, zvichireva kuti panenge pave nekushandurwa kwemitemo kwakasimba kuitira kuti mapato maviri aya apinde muhurumende imwechete.Ukuwo, mapato eMK neEFF, ayo ane nhengo dzakawanda dzakabuda mubato reANC, ndemamwe avanoti ane mukana mukuru wekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa, asi vanoti kunyange hazvo zvichigona kuitika zvinogona kusashanda nekuti vamwe vanotyira kuti zvinopedzisira zvadzinga vemabhizimusi vanoda kuzosima mari dzavo munyika iyi sezvo mapato maviri aya agara achizivikanwa paamire munyaya dzehupfumi hweSouth Africa uho anoti huchiri mumaoko evashoma.Vamwewo muMK vanonzi vari kuti kuti vabatane nebato riri kutonga iri mutungamiri wenyika VaCyril Ramaphosa vanofanirwa kutanga vasiya chigaro kubato reANC.Paramende yeSouth Africa ine nhengo mazana mana, idzo dzinosarudza mutungamiri wenyika. Paramende inonzi ine mazuva gumi nemana chete ekuti inge yashara mutauriri weParamende pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika.('Following the official announcement of the results of yesterday's South African elections by the Independent Electoral Commission, which shows that the ruling African National Congress, ANC, failed to get more than 50% of the votes to form a government on its own, the big issue is whether the party will join the party which or which parties? The major parties expected to join the ANC in forming a coalition government include the Democratic Alliance or DA, uMkhonto we Sizwe or MK, Economic Freedom Fighters or EFF, and other smaller ones. Political analyst, Mr. Kudakwashe Bandama, who is in South Africa, They say that the outcome of these elections was not what many expected because the idea of ​​a federal government was not in the minds of many. But they say that the DA party and others who got seats have a chance to enter the federal government with the ANC, but the main thing that will be looked at is how well you are in terms of leadership. But some political analysts say that the DA party has always criticized the policies of the ANC government, which means that there will be strong changes in the laws so that the two parties can enter the same government. On the other hand, the MK and EFF parties, which have many members who left the ANC party, are among those who say they have a great chance of forming a coalition government, but they say that although it is possible What happens may not work because some fear that it will end up driving away businessmen who want to invest in this country as these two parties have always been known for their position in South Africa's economic affairs which they say is still in the hands of the few. He has resigned from the ANC. The Parliament of South Africa has 400 members, which elect the president of the country. Parliament is said to have only 14 days left to appoint the speaker of Parliament and the president.')

instruction: Vaimbove Mutungamiri weCCC, VaChamisa, Vanoti VaMurisi Zwizwai Vaive Gamba muKurwirwa Hutongo hweJekerere('Former CCC President, Mr Chamisa, Says Mr Murisi Zwizwai Was A Hero In The Fight For Justice')
output: Vaimbove mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change, Va Nelson Chamisa, nhasi vatura mashoko enyaradzo kumhuri yaSeneta Murisi Zwizwai avo vakashaya nemusi weMugovera vachiti VaZwizwai munhu anofanira kuremekedzwa zvikuru nebasa ravakaita pahondo yekurwira hutongi hwejekerere muZimbabwe.Vachinyaradza mhuri yaVaZwizwai kumba kwavo muHarare nhasi, VaChamisa vati VaZwizwai vakabata basa guru mubato ravo pamwe nehurumende kuitira kuti vanhu vagare zvekanaka munyika nekudaro vanofanirwa kuremekedzwa.“Ngatinyaradzei gamba redu. Hamadzangu vematongerwo enyika, ngatibatei gamba redu. Mapato ese tipe ruremekedzokugamba redu iri nemashandire atakaita naVaZwizwai.”VaChamisa vatiwo vakashanda naVaZwizwai kubvira pakuumbwa bato reMDC muna 1999 vkaati mufi aida kuti munyika muve nehutongo hwejekerere.Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo vakazofamba nzira dzakasiyana vanoremekedza basa guru ravakaita.“Ndinozviziva kuti munhu aida kushandira nyika uye kuti vazenge vave kuSeneti nekuda kwezvakadai izvozvo hazvina mhaka izvo, hatirisi izvozvo isu totarisa pakabata munhu zvakanaka.Vanenge vachida kurekedza VaZwizwai nekuenda kuSeneti kwavakaita vane kodzero vane mvumo. Asi isu murume uyu takabva naye kure," vatsananguva VaChamisa.VaZwizwai avo vakamirira MDC mudunhu reHarare Central kwenguva yakareba, ndemumwe wevanhu vakaumba CCC naVaChamisa.Kunyange hazvo vakakundikana musarudzo dzekumirira bato iri musarudzo dzegore rapfuura, VaZwizwai vakashaya vari Seneta mushure mekudomwa kuve nhengo yedare iri naVaSengezo Tshabangu, avo vanozviti ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru we CCC.VaMurisi Zwizwai vakambomirira Harare Central.Mumwe akashanda naVaZwizwai, Seneta Moses Manyengavana, vati paramende nebato reCCC zvarasikirwa zvikuru nekuti VaZwizwai munhu aibatanidza vanhu.“VaZwizwai vaitibatsira kuti tive nechiona chimwe chete semusangano saka tarwadziwa zvakanyanya. Tinoti kuvanhu veZimbabwe ngatichemei tine tariro. VaZwizwai zvavakasiya ticharamba tichienderera mberi tichirwa kusvika Zimbabwe yasununguka.”Vaimbove nhengo yeNational Assembly uye vakashanda naVaZwizwai kwekunguva yakareba, Amai Joice Java vati vakabatsirwa zvikuru navaZwizwai.“Munhu wekuti dzimwe nguva unodakuita gakava muparamende womuti ndibatsireiwo panyaya yandiri kuda kusimudza mudare, vaikubatsira yobva yabuda zvakanaka uye kunyange ukaita dambudziko ringave rekumba chairo vaikubatsira.”Vanokokera nhengo dzeZanu PF mupararamende, VaPupurai Togarepi, vatsanagura VaZwizwai semunhu ange ave kuziva basa uye aishandika naye.“Zvaiva zvakanaka kuti vanotanga iko zvino nemaMPs vadzidze kubva kuvanhu vane ruzivo rwekuti basa reparamende rinofanofambiswa sei saka tine hurombo zvikuru nekurasikirwa nemumwe wedu. Tinoshuvira mhuri yavo kuti Mwari unovanyaradza mukuchengetwa kwavo kuti basa racho rifambe zvakanaka."VaZwizwai vanga vari nhengo yedare reSeneti.VaTogarepi vati nhengo dzeparamende sezvadzinoita nguva dzese dzichabatsira pakuradzikwa kwemutumbi waVaZwizwai neChipiri.Vachitaura vakamirira mhuri mukoma waVaZwizwai, VaMichail Muchengeti, vati mufi munhu aibatanidza nekusimudzira zvekuti mhuri yarasikirwa zvakanyanya.“Tarasikirwa kwete isu toga asi nenyika pamwe nenharaunda yaigara.”VaZwizwai vakashaya nemusi weMugovera mangwanani uye vasiya mudzimai nevana vanomwe.VaZwizwai vakaitwa mutevedzeri wegorukota rezvemigodhi munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa kubva muna 2009 kusvika muna 2013Mutumbi wavo ucharadzikwa kumarinda eGlen Forest muHarare, neChipiri masikati.('The former leader of the opposition party Citizens Coalition for Change, Mr. Nelson Chamisa, today offered condolences to the family of Senator Murisi Zwizwai who passed away on Saturday, saying that Mr. Zwizwai should be respected for the work he did in the fight for democracy in Zimbabwe. Condoling the family of Mr. Zwizwai at his home in Harare today, Mr. Chamisa said that Mr. Zwizwai they played a major role in their party and the government so that people can live well in the country and therefore deserve respect. Let's comfort our hero. My political brothers, let's hold our hero. All parties should give respect to our hero and the way we worked with Mr. Zwizwai. Mr. Chamisa also said that he worked with Mr. Zwizwai since the formation of the MDC party in 1999 and said that the deceased wanted the country to have a fair trial. He went on to say that even though they went their separate ways, they respect the great work he did. I know that he was a person who wanted to serve the country. and for them to be in the Senate because of such things, it is not their fault, we do not consider that and look at what is right for the person. But we have distanced ourselves from this man, explained Mr. Chamisa. Mr. Zwizwai, who represented the MDC in Harare Central district for a long time, is one of the people who formed the CCC with Mr. Chamisa. Although he failed in the elections to represent the party in last year's elections, Mr. Zwizwai died as a senator after being nominated as a member of this committee. and Mr. Sengezo Tshabangu, who claims to be the former secretary general of the CCC. Mr. Murisi Zwizwai previously represented Harare Central. Someone who worked with Mr. Zwizwai, Senator Moses Manyengavana, said that parliament and the CCC party have lost a lot because Mr. Zwizwai was a person who brought people together. We say to the people of Zimbabwe that we have hope. When Mr. Zwizwai left, we will continue to fight until Zimbabwe is free. Ms. Joice Java, who was a member of the National Assembly and worked with Mr. Zwizwai for a long time, said that she was helped by Mr. Zwizwai. if you want to raise it in court, they would help you and it would turn out well and even if you had a problem that might be at home, they would help you. Invited members of Zanu PF in the parliament, Mr. Pupurai Togarepi, described Mr. Zwizwai as a person who knew his job and worked with him. It was good that the new MPs should learn from people who knowledge of how parliamentary work is carried out in advance so we are very sorry to lose one of our own. We wish his family that God comforts them in his care so that the work goes well."Mr. Zwizwai was a member of the Senate. Mr. Togarepi said that members of parliament, as they always do, will help in the burial of Mr. Zwizwai's body on Tuesday. Speaking on behalf of the family, Mr. Zwizwai's brother, Mr. Michail Muchengeti, said that the deceased was a person who united and promoted. that the family has lost a lot. We have lost not only ourselves but the country and the community where we lived. Mr. Zwizwai died on Saturday morning and is survived by his wife and seven children. Mr. Zwizwai was made deputy minister of mines during the federal government from 2009 to 2013. His body will be laid to rest at the Glen Forest cemetery in Harare, on Tuesday afternoon.')

instruction: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanosvika kuSouth Korea kuMusangano weKorea-Africa('The President, Mnangagwa, arrives in South Korea for the Korea-Africa Summit')
output: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vasvika muSeoul, guta guru reSouth Korea, uko vari kutarisirwa kupinda musangano wemazuva maviri weKorea-Africa Summit, uyo uchatanga neChipiri.VaMnangagwa vanonzi vari kuperekedzwa kumusangano uyu nemakurukota anoti rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, rezvemamiriro ekunze, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni pamwe nerezvekurima, Doctor Anxious Masuka, pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende yavo.Mutungamiri wenyika anonzi achibva kumusangano uyu achabva aenda kune mumwe musangano weSt. Petersburg International Economic Forum kuRussia.Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti mutungamiri wenyika vanofanirwa kunge vachisharawo mimwe misangano yekuti vanotuma vatewedzeri vavo, kana makurukota chaiwo, kwete kuti vade kupinda misangano yese yangoshevedzerwa.Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano reZimbabwe Network for Social Justice, VaTendai Ruben Mbofana, vanoti hapana hapo chakapia kuti misangano yakadai iitwe.Asi vanoti nyika dzemuAfrica dziri kuzvideredzera zvakanyanya nekungobvuma kushevedzwa kumisangano yese yangonzi yaitwa nenyika dzekumawirira, zvinoguma zvaita sekunge vatungamiri ava vanotya veganda jena.Vanoti nyika dzemuAfrica dzinofanirwawo kuita misangano yakadai dzokokawo vekumawirira nevekumabvazuva ava, asi vachiti izvi hazviite nekuda kwenyaya dzehuwori.Bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko rinoti misangano iyi ichapa mikana kuvatungamiri venyika dzepasi rino nevemabhizimusi wekuti vazeye nyaya dzakakosha dzine chekuita nezvehupfumi pamwe nekutengeserana.Nyika makumi mana nesere dzemuAfrica dziri kutarisirwa kupinda musangano weKorea-Africa Summit uyu.('President Emmerson Mnangagwa is said to have arrived in Seoul, the capital of South Korea, where he is expected to attend the two-day Korea-Africa Summit, which will begin on Tuesday. Nyoni and the Minister of Agriculture, Doctor Anxious Masuka, as well as other officials in his government. Petersburg International Economic Forum in Russia. Some political analysts say that the president should be holding other meetings that he sends his followers, or ministers, not that they want to attend all the meetings that have been called. Political analysts are the head of the Zimbabwe Network for Social Justice. Mr. Tendai Ruben Mbofana, says that there is no reason for such meetings to be held. But he says that African countries are humiliating themselves by accepting invitations to all the meetings that are said to have been held by eastern countries, and it seems as if these leaders are afraid of white skinned people. but saying that this is not possible due to corruption issues. The Ministry of Public Information says that these meetings will provide opportunities for world leaders and businessmen to discuss important issues related to the economy and trade. Forty-eight African countries are expected to participate in the Korea-Africa Summit.')

instruction: IEC Inozivisa Zvakabuda Musarudzo Bato reANC Richiwana Zvigaro Zana neMakumi Mashanu neZvipfumbamwe('IEC Announces Election Results ANC Party Gets 159 Seats')
output: Komisheni inotungamira sarudzo muSouth Africa yazivisa zviri pamutemo zvakabuda musarudzo dzakaitwa neChitatu svondo rapera, izvo zvinoratidza kuti bato riri kutonga reANC rakawana zvigaro zana nemakumi mashanu nezvipfumbamwe, 159, kubva mazana maviri nemakumi matatu, 203 zvarakawana muna 2019.Bato reDA, iro riri pachinzvimbo chepiri, rine zvigaro makumi masere nezvinomwe, 87 kubva pazvigaro makumi masre nezvina, 84, zvakarawana muna 2019.Bato idzva reMK rakaumbwa naVaJacob Zuma rine zvigaro makumi mashanu nezvisere, 58, kuchitiwo reEFF raVaJulius Malema richiwana zvigaro makumi matatu nezvipfumbamwe, 39, kubva pazvigaro makumi mana nezvina, 44, zvarakawana muna 2019.ANC haina kusvika panodiwa pazvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana kuti ikwanise kuumba hurumende iri yoga, zvinoreva kuti yave kufanirwa kuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa nerimwe bato kana mapato.Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo bato reMK nemamwe mapato vakanyorera ku IEC vachida kuti imire kuburitsa zvakabuda musarudzo itange yagadzirisa nyunyuto dzavo dzekuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka.Bato reMK raVaJacob Zuma rinoti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka neIEC.Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa pachikoro chepamusorosoro cheUNISA, Doctor Eddie Mahembe, vanove mukuru weUnderhill Corporate Solutions, vanoti zvaziviswa neIEC izvi zvinhu zvanga zvagara zvichizivikanwa sezvo zvinobuda musarudzo zvichinamirwa panzvimbo yekuvhotera yoga yoga.Panyaya yekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvaziviswa paine mamwe mapato ari kunyunyuta, Doctor Mahembe vanoti mubumbiro remitemo yeSouth Africa pane nzira dzinoteverwa dzekusvitsa zvinyunyuto dzinofanirwa kuteverwa nemapato ari kunyunyuta.Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwemavhoti uku, dare reparamende rave kuzogara mukati memazuva gumi nemana rosarudza mutauriri weparamende pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika.Aka ndekekutanga mukati memakore makumi matatu kubva South Africa yawana kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1994 kuti ANC irasikirwe nechidanho chekuve ndiyo ine huwandu hwemavhoti zvinoita kuti ikwanise kuumba hurumende iri yoga, zvichireva kuti yave kumanikidzwa kuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa nebato.IEC inoti zvikamu makumi mashanu nezvisere nezviga makumi matanhatu nechimwe kubva muzana, 58.61 percent ndizvo zvakakwanisa kuvhota pavanhu vanoda kusvika kumamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere, 28 million, vakanga vakanyoresa kuvhota.('The Electoral Commission in South Africa has officially announced the results of the elections held on Wednesday last week, which show that the ruling ANC won 159,159 seats, out of the 232,203 they won in 2019. The DA, which is in second place, It has 87 seats, 87 out of the 84 seats it won in 2019. The new MK party formed by Jacob Zuma has 58 seats, while the EFF of Julius Malema has 39 seats, 39 out of 44 seats. , 44, which they achieved in 2019. The ANC did not reach the required 50% to be able to form a government on its own, which means it has to form a coalition government with another party or parties. This is coming at a time when the MK party and other parties have written to the IEC demanding that it stand The publication of the results of the election should first address their complaints that the elections were not conducted properly. Mr. Jacob Zuma's MK party says that the elections were not conducted properly by the IEC. as the results of the elections are posted at each polling station. Regarding the fact that the results of the elections have been announced with some parties complaining, Doctor Mahembe says that in the constitution of South Africa there are procedures to be followed for submitting complaints that must be followed by the parties complaining. Following the release of the votes, the parliament will sit within 10 days This is the first time in the 30 years since South Africa gained independence in 1994 that the ANC has lost the position of being the one with the majority of votes that would enable it to form a single government, meaning that it is now forced to form a coalition government with a party. IEC says Fifty-eight and sixty-one percent, 58.61 percent were able to vote out of the 28 million people who were registered to vote.')

instruction: ANC Yotsvaga veKuumba Navo Hurumende yeMubatanidzwa
output: Apo kuverengwa kwemavhoti mu South Africa kwave kusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo, zvave kubuda pachena kuti African National Congress – ANC, yakundikana kuti isvike pazvikamu zvinodarika zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kana kuti50 plus 1%kuti iumbe hurumende.Munyori mukuru weANC VaFikile Mbalula vaudza vatori venhau kuti vakagadzirira kushanda nerimwe bato kana mapato kuti vaumbe hurumende yemubatanidzwa.Parizvino ANC ine zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana kana kuti 40.20, DA ine zvikamu zvinodarika makumi maviri nerimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 21. 78%, uMkonto weSizwe ine zvikamu zvinodarika gumi nezvina kubva muzana kana kuti 14, 59% ukuwo EFF iine zvikamu zvinodarika gumi nepfumbamwe kubva muzana kana kuti 9.51%.Nyazvi munya dze zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology kuSouth Africa, Muzvinafundo Ricky Mukonza vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvave opachena kuti pave kufanira kuumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa.Muzvinafundo Mukonza vanotiwo, chero hazvo paine vamwe vashoma vane kunyunyuta nemafambiro akaita sarudzo , vatungamiri vemapato akasiyana siyana vari kubvuma kuti sarudzo idzi dzaitwa zvakanaka, murunyararo pasina mhirizhonga.Vatiwo pane zvizhinji zvingadzidzwe ne Zimbabwe kubva mumafambisirwo ari kuitwa sarudzo muSouth Africa. Zimbabwe yakaita sarudzo gore rapera dzakashorwa nevakawanda dzichinzi dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro.('When the counting of votes in South Africa is about to reach its breaking point, it has become clear that the African National Congress - ANC, has failed to reach more than 51 percent or 50 plus 1% to form a government. The secretary general of the ANC Mr. Fikile Mbalula told the press that they are ready to work with another party or parties to form a coalition government. Currently the ANC has 40 percent or 40.20, the DA has more than 21 percent or 21. 78%, uMkonto we Sizwe has more than 14 percent or 14 , 59% while the EFF has more than 19 percent or 9.51%. Now in politics while teaching at the Tswane University of Technology in South Africa, Professor Ricky Mukonza told Studio 7 that it has become clear that a federal government should be formed. Professor Mukonza also says, although there are a few who complain about the way the election was conducted, the leaders of the various parties are accepting that the election was conducted in a peaceful manner without violence. Zimbabwe held an election last year that was criticized by many as being highly rigged.')

instruction: Vanorwara neChirwere cheShuga Vorangarirwa kuMasvingo Vachirapwa Pachena('People suffering from diabetes are seen at the walls being treated in public')
output: Vanorwara nechirwere cheshuga kuMasvingo vanoti vari kufara nerubatsiro rwavari kuwana kubva kusangano reSolidArmed, iroriri kubatsira vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe pachena.Sangano iri rinowana rutsigiro kubva kunyika yeSwitzerland uye iye zvino vanhu vari kubatsirwa paMasvingo Provincial Hospital, Mashoko Christian Hospital neNdanga District Hospital.Mumwe anoshanda nesangano iri,uye arizve nhengo yeNoncommunicable Diseases and Injuries Poverty Network, VaTinotenda Dzikiti, vari kukurudzira vane chirwere cheshuga nezvimwewo zvinoda rubatsiro kuti vaende kuzvipatara zvekuMasvingo.VaDzikiti vanoti vari kurarama nechirwere ichi pari zvino uye vari kushandisa ruzivo rwavo mukuyedza kudzidzisa vamwe, kunyanya vanoshaya, pamusoro pekukoshesa kuwongororwa chirwere ichi nekupanga kutora mishonga wekuti vararame zviri nani."Ini ndiri mumwe weavo vanotora mishonga yeshuga uye ndiri kushandisa ruzivo rwangu pasi pechirongwa cheVoice For Pen-Plus Advocate mukuyedza kuparadzira ruzivo urwu kune veruzhinji vari kutarisana nedenda nechirwere cheshuga, nyanya vasina mari yekuwongororwa kana kurapwa. Sangano randiri kushanda naro rinopa zvakare mishonga pasi pechirongwa chiri kuitwa kuMasvingo pari zvino," VaDzikiti vaudza Studio7.VaDzikiti vanoti pari zvino vakatobva kune mumwe musangano mukuru wange uchiitwa kuTanzania wanga uchizeya pamusoro pezve nzira itzva dzekurapa chirwere cheshuga.('People suffering from diabetes in Masvingo say they are happy with the help they are getting from the SolidArmed organization, which is helping 900 people for free. This organization receives support from Switzerland and currently people are being helped at Masvingo Provincial Hospital, Mashoko Christian Hospital and Ndanga District Hospital. Someone who works with this organization, and who is also a member of the Noncommunicable Diseases and Injuries Poverty Network, Mr. Tinotenda Dzikiti, is encouraging people with diabetes and other conditions that need help to go to the Masvingo hospitals. This is by planning to take medication to live better. I am one of those who take diabetes medication and I am using my knowledge under the Voice For Pen-Plus Advocate program in an effort to spread this information to the public who are facing the epidemic and diabetes, especially those who do not have the money for examination or treatment. The organization I am working with also provides medicines under the program currently being implemented in Masvingo," Mr. Dzikiti told Studio7. Mr. Dzikiti said that he had already come from a big meeting that was being held in Tanzania that was discussing about new ways to treat diabetes.')

instruction: Hurumende Yotumira Chikwata kuHurungwe Kwafa Vana Makumi Matatu Nemashanu (35) neChirwere cheMahumunya neGwirikwiti('Government To Send Team To Hurunge Thirty Five (35) Children Died Of Mahumunya And Gwirkwiti Disease')
output: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti chikwata cheCivil Protection Unit kana kuti CPU vari kuHurungwe, Mashonaland West kune vana makumi matatu nevashanu vafa nechirwere chemahumunya nechegwirikwiti.VaMagwanwa vakataura mashoko aya padandemutande reX, yaimbonzi Twitter. Vanotiwo vana ava vane vabereki vanopinda kereke dzisingabvumidze nhengo dzavo kubayiwa nhomba kana kuenda kuzvipatara.VaMangwana vanoti nyaya iyi yakazobuda mushure mekunge mumwe wechitendero ichi aendesa vana kuchipatara cheKaroi vakawanikwa vaine chirwere chegwirikwiti nemahumunya.Mugore ra 2022 vana vanodarika zana nemakumi mashanu vakafa nechirwere chegwirikwiti icho chakabata vamwe vanodarika mazana maviri.Asi mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati vange vachangopinda muhofisi nekudaro vati tozovabata mangwana sezvo vange vasati vasumwa zvizere.Asi chiremba VaSimbiso Ranga vaudza Studio7 kuti chirwere chegwirikwiti chinogona kukundwa chete nekubaya vana nhomba.('The chief secretary in the information department, Mr Nick Mangwana, says that the Civil Protection Unit or CPU in Hurungwe, Mashonaland West has 35 children who have died of mumps and measles. They also say that these children have parents who attend churches that do not allow their members to be vaccinated or go to hospitals. Mr. Mangwana says that this issue came to light after a member of this religion took the children to the Karoi hospital and they were found to have measles and mumps. In the year 2022, more than 150 children died of measles which affected others. there are more than 200. But the spokesperson of the Ministry of Health, Mr. Donald Mujiri, said that they had just entered the office and therefore said that they would contact them tomorrow as they had not yet been fully introduced.')

instruction: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Mwedzi weChirwere cheAutism('Zimbabwe Joins Other Countries in Observing Autism Awareness Month')
output: Zimbabwe iri kubatana nedzimwe nyika kucherechedza mwedzi wevana vane pfungwa dzisingaenderane nezera ravo kana kuti "autism", vabereki vari kukurudzirwa kuti vanyatsotarisisa vana vavo sezvo chirwere ichi chichinonoka kuzivikanwa kuti chabata mwana. Mwedzi waKubvumbi wega wega ndiwo unocherechedzwa chirwere ichi.Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinoshanda kuNorth Carolina sachiremba Dr Simbiso Ranga vanoti vabereki vanofanirwa kushanda navana chiremba. Vati, "Kazhinji kacho vana vanenge vaine dambudziko re"autism" vanonetsekana nekutaura nezvimwe zvekuti vamwe vanototi mwana haateerera ane musikanzawa icho chiri chirwere ichi," Dr Ranga vaudza Studio7.('Zimbabwe is joining other countries to observe the month of children with mental retardation or "autism", parents are being encouraged to keep a close eye on their children as this disease is delayed in recognizing that it has affected a child. This disease is recognized every April. A native of Zimbabwe who works in North Carolina as a doctor, Dr Simbiso Ranga, says that parents should work with children's doctors. He said, "Most of the time children who have the problem of "autism" have difficulty speaking and others say that the child does not listen because of this disease," Dr Ranga told Studio7.')

instruction: Madzimai eKumaruwa Ofadzwa neChirongwa cheKuvhenekwa neKurapwa kweGomarara reChibereko('Rural women are happy with the Program for Screening and Treatment of Ovarian Cancer')
output: Mamwe madzimai ekumaruwa anoti anotambira nemufaro chirongwa chekuvhenekwa nekurapwa kwechirwere chegomarara rechibereko icho chiri kutungamirwa nebazi rezvehutano richitsigirwa neWorld Health Organisation, W-H-O.Mamwe emadzimai ari kufara nekuuya kwechirongwa ichi munharaunda yavo ari kuMakonde mudunhu reMashonaland West, ayo anoti pari zvino kuongororwa kwegomarara rechibereko uku kwave kuitwa pakiriniki yeUmboe iri pedyo navo zvichienzaniswa nakare pavaiyenda kuno ongororwa kuChinhoyi kunova kure uye kuchida mari yekufambisa.Kiriniki yeUmboe imwe yemakiriniki mazana maviri akaitwa nzvimbo dzekutorera zvinozovhenekwa pamunhukadzi kuti zviongororwe kuti ane gomarara here kana kuti kwete, zvinonzi muChirungu masample.Zvirongwa izvi zvinonzi zviri kusangana nedambudziko rekushomeka kwavanamukoti.Amai Babra Matariranwa, vekuKaswa makare mudunhu diki reMakonde, avo vanove mumwe wemadzimai akaongororwa chirwere chegomarara akawanikwa asina, vanoti vakaongororwa nekuti vari pachirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikamisa hukasha hweHIV/AIDS sezvo zvichinzi vanhu vakadai vari panjodzi huru yekubatwa nechirwere chegomarara rechibereko.“Ndakaenda kunoongororwa nekuti ndiri pachirongwa cheHIV/AIDS uye kuti ndizive zvandiri panyaya dzeCervical cancer” Amai Matariranwa vanotsanangura.Mumwe mudzimai akaongororwa, Amai Jane Kavhaya, vanoti kuongororwa kwakanakira kuti munhu anoziva zvaari uye kana ane chirwere anokurumidza kurapwa chisati chakomba.“Kuongororwa kwakanaka kuti ukawanikwa une chirwere unokurumidza kurapwa chirwere chisati chakomba” Amai Kavhaya vanowedzera.Asi mumwe mudzimai wechidiki, Amai Priviledge Masarakufa vekuDoma, avo vasati vaongororwa, vanoti chirongwa ichi chakanaka asi hachisi kushambadzirwa zvakakwana kumaruwa sezvo vakanonoka kuziva nezvacho.“Handisati ndaongororwa nekuti ndanga ndisingazive kuti chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa muno” Amai Masarakufa vanotsanangura.Gurukotaq rezvehutano, VaDouglas MombeshoraGurukota rezvehutano, Dr Douglas Mombeshora, avo vakabvakachira kiriniki yeUmboe pamwe nevamwe vashandi veW-H-O vainge vabva kumuzinda wavo kuSwitzerland, vanoti chirongwa ichi chiri kusangana nematambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kushomeka kwevanoongorora, kufamba mitunhu yakareba kwemadzimai vachienda kumakiriniki kunoisa ma samples uye kushomeka kwanautsanana vemunzvimbo ,kana kuti village health workers.“Matambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kushomeka kwevashandi vezvehutano kumaruwa” Dr Mombeshora vanozivisa.Dr. Mombeshora vanoti senzira yekuderedza mamwe ematambudziko aya vachaedza nepavanogona kuchengetedza vashandi mubazi rezvehutano nekuvapa zvikwanisiro, dzimba dzekugara pamwe nezvekufambisa kuti vasatize vachienda kunotsvaka mafuro manyoro.“Tiri kuwanisa vashandi vezvehutano zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa, dzimba dzekugara pamwe nezvekufambisa kurerutsa mararamiro avo kuti vasatize kuenda kumafuro manyoro” Dr Mombeshora vanozivisa.Vamwe vanamukoti vari kuita basa muchironga ichi.Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera huwandu hwevashandi vezvehutano vose, zvikuru kumaruwa uye vanofanirwa kupihwa mari dzinovakwanira kwete kupihwa mabhazi ekufambisa kana pekugara.“Vashandi vezvehutano vanofanirwa kuwedzerwa uye kupihwa mari dzemihoro dzinovakwanira kwete kungopihwa zvekufambisa chete” Dr Madzorera vanotsanangura.Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weW-H-O muZimbabwe, Dr. Sarah Wanyoike, vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita basa guru munyaya dzekupedza chirwere chegomarara rechibereko asi vachiti inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kuwana zvimwe zvikwanisiro uye kuwedzera vashandi vehutano kumaruwa.“Zimbabwe iri kuita basa guru kupedza dambudziko rechirwere chegomarara rechibereko asi vanofanirwa kuwedzera vashandi vezvehutano nezvimwe zvikwanisiro zvatichaedza kuvayamura nazvo” Dr Sarah Wanyoike vanovimbisa.Dr. Sarah Wanyoike mukuru weWHO muZimbabwe.Bazi rezvehutano rinechirongwa chekuongorora gomarara rechibereko kumadzimai ose ane makore ari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu kusvika pamakore makumi mana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 15 kusvika 49.Vasikana vane makore ari pakati pemapfumbamwe negumi nemana kana kuti 9-14 vari kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kuti vasazobatwa nechirwere chegomarara rechibereko ichi kana vakura rinonzi Human Papillomavirus kana kuti HPV.Asi chirongwa chekubaya vasikana nhomba chinonzi chiri kusangana nematambudziko ekuti havasi vasikana vose vari pakati pemakore aya vari kuenda kuzvikoro uko vashandi vezvehutano vari kufamba vachibaya nhomba, sekutaura kwegurukota rezvedunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Marian Chombo.“Vamwe vana vasikana havasi kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere chegomarara nekuda kwekuti havasi kuchikoro, kuri kufamba kuchibayiwa nhomba nevashandi vezvehutano” Amai Chombo vanotsanangura.Amai Marian Chombo.Mudzimai akatorwasamplepakiriniki iri pedyo naye inozoendeswa pachipatara chikuru chemudunhu uko inonoongororwa kuti hapana mazai egomarara here.Kana paine mazai egomarara anobva arapwa kuuraya mazai acho, asi kana pave nechirwere chegomarara panobviswa tunyama twunoendeswa kuzvipatara zvikuru zveParirenyatwa kuHarare kana kuMpilo kuBulawayo kuti zviongororwe kuti gomarara racho rakomba zvakadii, izvo zvinotora mwedzi mitanhatu sezvo vana mazvikokota vanovheneka vari vashoma.Sangano reWHO rinoti gomarara rechibereko ndiro gomarara rechina riri kuuraya madzimai akawanda pasi rose uye rinoti madzimai zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu, kana kuti 660 000, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye madzimai zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 350 000 vakafa negomarara iri mugore ra2022 chete pasi rose.Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dziri kuwana rubatsiro kubva kumari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora ( US$600 million) yakapiwa ne W-H-O kupedza gomarara rechibereko kana kuti cervical cancer panosvika gore ra2030.('Some rural women say that they are happy to welcome the screening and treatment program for cervical cancer which is being led by the Ministry of Health with the support of the World Health Organisation, W-H-O. The Umboe clinic is closer to them compared to the past when they used to go to Chinhoyi for a check-up which is far away and requires travel expenses. The Umboe clinic is one of the 200 clinics that have been set up to collect samples from women to check if they have cancer or not, called samples in English. These programs are said to be facing the problem of a shortage of nurses .Mama Babra Matariranwa, from Kaswa in Makonde sub-district, who is one of the women who was tested for cancer and was found to be negative, says that she was tested because she is taking pills to reduce the severity of HIV/AIDS as it is said that such people are at high risk of contracting cervical cancer.I went to be tested because I am on the HIV/AIDS program and to know what I am doing in terms of Cervical cancer Ms. Matarinanwa explains. Another woman who was tested, Ms. Jane Kavhaya, says that testing is good because a person knows what they are and if they have the disease, they can be treated quickly before it becomes serious. Testing is good so that you can be found If you have a disease, you need to be treated quickly before the disease becomes serious Ms. Kavhaya adds. But another young woman, Ms. Priviledge Masarakufa from Doma, who has not yet been tested, says that this program is good but it is not advertised enough in the rural areas as she was too late to find out about it. I have not been tested because I did not know that this program is Ms. Masarakufa explains. instruction: Vagari vekuDorapindo Vogara Vachityira Zvirwere Kubva muMvura yemuRwizi Sakubva('The residents of Dorapindo are always afraid of diseases from the water of the Sakubva River')
output: Vamwe vagari venharaunda yeDorapindo kumadokero kweguta reMutare mudunhu reManicaland vanoti vari kugara vakangobatira ura mumaoko vachityira kutapurira zvirwere zvemanyoka nezvimwe zvinokonzerwa nekushandisa mvura isina kuchena.Vagari ava vari kushandisa mvura yemurwizi Sakubva iyo vanoti yakasviba zvakanyanya nekuda kwetsvina yevanhu inopfachukira imomo nguva zhinji.Rwizi Sakubva rwunoyerera rwichidarika nemumisha inogara veruzhinji yemuguta reMutare inosanganisira Sakubva, Chikanga, Destiny, Hobhouse neDangamvura, umo mune pombi dzinofambisa tsvina dzinogara dzichipfachuka tsvina zhinji ichiguma yayerera ichipinda murwizi urwu.Kutsemuka nekupfachuka kwepombi dzetsvina yemuzvimbuzi uku kunonzi kunonyanya kukonzerwa nekushayikwa kwemvura mudzimba kwenguva yakareba izvo zvinonzi zvinozokonzera kuti pombi dziremerwe panozouya mvura inofambisa tsvina iyi.Tsvina yevanhu inonzi iri kupfachukira murwizi Sakubva.VaRegis Dembaremba mumwe wevagari venharaunda yeDorapindo uye mhuri yavo ichishandisa mvura yemunaSakubva.VaDembaremba vanoti vakawanda munharaunda mavo vanotongoshandisa mvura iyi kudiridza mapindu avo chete sezvo yakanganisika zvekusakodzera kunwiwa nemunhu, kunyangwe hazvo zvipfuyo zvavo zvichinwa mvura iyi.“Zviri kuitika izvi zvino affecta vose vari kuzasi kuno kusvika muna rwizi Save, nokuti ndimo munodirwa mvura nanaSakubva nanaOdzi, saka zvese zve pollution zvinenge zvichidzika zvozo affecta vese vanenge vachishandisa mvura iyi."Saka dai tarega zvatiri kuita izvi zvatiri kuona zviri kungokandwa murwizi zvinosanganisira ma pampers evana zvinenge zvichingokandirwa imomo nezvimwe zvinenge zvakasungwa zvinenge zvema rituals zvichingokandwa."Remember, mvura iyi inonwiwa nezvipfuyo zvedu, mombe, mbudzi pamwe nesuwo saka zvinokanganisa hutano hwevanhu. Zvekare mune hove dzinoredzwa imomo dzatinodya,” VaDembaremba vanodaro.VaPeter Matimba mumwe mugari wenharaunda yeDora. VaMatimba vaudza Studio 7 kuti kune vamwe vanotoraura hove murwizi urwu vachitengesera vagary vachinyeba kuti vanenge vadzibata kudhamu Osborne riri kuchamhembe kweguta kana kuti kune dzimwe nzvimbo.“Zvechokwadi muna Sakubva River umu mune pollution yakanyanya saka zvinoita kuti tisangane nezvirwere, especially nyaya dzemudumbu, nekuti kunouya vakomana vaine miramba vachitengesa iyo tinongosvika kumba tichibika vachingoti yabva muna Odzi, yabva kwakati, asi yabva muna Sakubva."Saka tiri kudya zvisakachena nekuti mave kushandiswa senzvimbo yekurasa garbage, dumping area, saka dai waro zvagadziriswa,” VaMatimba vanodaro.Mugari wekuDorapindo, VaLuke Mukungatu.VaLuke Mandava Mukungatu mumwewo wemhuri dzinogara mumahombekombe erwizi Sakubva. VaMukungatu vanoti vanotoshandisa mvura yekunwa yemuchibhorani chavakachererwa nehurumende, asi vanoti deno zvibhorani izvi zvikawedzerwa zveso chimwechete ichi chisiri kukwanira vagari.“Isisu mvura yemuna Sakubva hatishandisiba nekuti inobva kumaindasitiri iine maoyiri, ma sewer, saka isusu tinotoshandisa hedu yemuma-boreholes atakachererwa nehurumende ari muno asi mashoma. Mamwe acho haasati apedza kugadzirwa saka tichiri nedambudziko remvura inotikwanira,” VaMukungatu vanodaro.Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaPassmore Nyakureba, veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vanoti hazvina kunaka kuti vanosvibisa mvura varegwe vakadaro vachingoenderera mberi nekuita uku, asi kuti vanosungirwa kurangwa pasi pemutemo kuti vasiye tsika iyi.“Nyaya ye pollution yemuna Sakubva iyi pane mutemo unoti ano polluta ndiye anobhadhara, the polluter pays principle. Ndiwo mutemo unofanirwa kuteedzerwa neEMA ine basa reku-enforcerma-environmental issues."Saka EMA inofanira kumeka shuwa kuti vanhu vari kupollutarwizi zvinozokanganisa mvura inozoshandiswa nevaridownstreamvanofanira kunge vachibatwa ne-EMA vachibhadhariswa mafainzi anokodzera kuti vasarambe vachi polluta nzizi idzodzo, kunyanya Sakubva River nekuti zvinokanganisa utano hwevanhu nezvipfuyo zvavo kunyanya zvakaita kunana Dora uko.”Amai Alice Rutsvara vanoshanda nesangano rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezvakatikomberedza, reEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, vachiona nezvedzidziso uye kubudiswa kwemashoko kubazi iri.Amai Rutsvara vanoti vanoshushikana nekusvibiswa kuri kugaroitwa munarwizi Sakubva uye vari kuita chenjedzo yekuti izvi zviregwe pamwe nekuyambira vari kusvibisa mvura kuti vanoripiswa.Vamwe vanonzi vari kurarama nekutengesa hove dzemuna Sakubva.“Bazi reEnvironmental Management Agency riri kusngana nekusvibiswa kwemvura muna Sakubva River. Kusvibiswa kwemvura iyi kuri kunyanya kukonzereswa nema burst sewer, uye nemamwe makambani kuNyakamete ari kudirira mvura yakasviba munharaunda."Zvakadaro, EMA yakatora matanho ekuramba ichiongorora makambani aya uye kushanda nekanzuru yeguta reMutare kuvhara ma-leakagesmuguta nekushanda nenguva kugadzirisa nyaya dzemaburst sewer pipes."Izvi zvese zviri maringe nemutemo wedu weStatutory Instrument Number 6(Six)wa2007. Ongororo imwe inoratidza kuti nzira dzinofamba ne-sewage dzava nemakore dzagarisa zvekuti hadzichakwanisi kutakura sewage yose iri kubva mudzimba nekukura kuri kuita guta redu, vagari vanokurudzirwa zvakare kumhan’gara pose pane burst sewer kukanzuru yedu.”Vagarai vanonzi vari kunwa mvura isina kuchena mumaguta akawanda emunyika.Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weguta reMutare, VaCharles Sadondo, vanoti seguta vari kuedza napose pavanogona napo kuderedza nyaya dzekusvibiswa kwenharaunda, kusanganisira nzizi sezvinotarisirwa.“Tatsvaga muma centres edu matinosigamuchira zvichemo zvakafanana neizvi asi hapana chichemo chatawana. Asi tinowanzokurudzira vagari nevamwe vakapoteredza guta kuti kana vachinge vasangana nenyaya dzakadai idzi vaisereportkuma-officesedu kwakasiyanasiyana kana kushandisaplatformyedu yeCity of Mutare Whattsapppa0775 792 461 kuti tikwanise kugadzirisa matambudziko akafanana naiwaya,” VaSadondo vanodaro.Dambudziko rekusvibiswa kwenzizi rinonzi nevakawanda harisi rekuDorapindo chete asi kuti nzizi dzinodarika nemumaguta nemumadhorobha akawanda emunyika dziri kusvibiswa zvakanyanya nevagari, makambani pamwe nemakanzuru izvo zvinosiira dambudziko rezvehutano kune vagere zasi kwenzizi idzi.Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevanomirira vagari vanoti kudzamara mapazi ehurumende atora matanho akakodzera ekuona mafambisirwo ari kuitwa mabasa nemakanzuru uye nevemakambani pakuderedza kuzvibiswa kwemvura nenharaunda, vagari vakawanda munyika kusanganisira vekuDorapindo, vacharamba vakatarisana nematambudziko ekushandisa mvura yakasviba.('Some residents of Dorapindo area west of Mutare town in Manicaland district say that they are sitting holding their intestines in their hands for fear of contracting diarrheal diseases and other diseases caused by using unclean water. These residents are using water from the river Sakubva which they say is very dirty because of the human waste that often overflows there. The river Sakubva flows through the villages public housing in the city of Mutare including Sakubva, Chikanga, Destiny, Hobhouse and Dangamvura, where there are sewage pipes that are always overflowing and a lot of waste ends up flowing into the river. The cracking and overflowing of the sewage pipes in the toilet is said to be mainly caused by a lack of water in the houses for a long time which is said to cause the pipes to become overloaded. The water transports this waste. Human excrement is said to be overflowing into the river Sakubva. Mr. Regis Dembaremba is one of the residents of the Dorapindo community and his family uses the water from Sakubva. Mr. Dembaremba says that many people in his community only use this water to irrigate their gardens as it is contaminated to the point that it is not suitable for humans to drink, even though their animals drink the water What is happening now affects everyone down here to the Save river, because that is where water is poured from Sakubva and Odzi, so all the pollution will go down and affect everyone who is using this water. Remember, this water is drunk by our animals, cows, goats and us, so it affects people's health. Again, there are fish caught there that we eat, Mr. Dembaremba says. Mr. Peter Matimba is another resident of the Dora area. Mr. Matimba told Studio 7 that there are some people who fish in this river and sell it to vagaries, lying that they have caught them in Osborne lake in the north of the city or in other places.Indeed, there is a lot of pollution in Sakubva River, which causes us to suffer from diseases, especially stomach issues, because there are boys who come with bags and sell them, which we just get home and cook, saying that it came from Odzi, it came from somewhere, but it came from Sakubva. So we are eating cleanly because you have It is being used as a garbage dumping area, so it should be fixed, said Mr. Matimba. A resident of Dorapindo, Mr. Luke Mukungatu. Mr. Luke Mandava Mukungatu is one of the families who live on the banks of the Sakubva river. This is not enough for the residents. We don't use Sakubva's water because it comes from industries with oil and sewers, so we use the boreholes dug by the government, but they are few. Some of them have not been completed yet, so we still have a problem with getting enough water, said Mr. Mukungatu human rights activist, Mr. Passmore Nyakureba, from Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, says it is not right that those who pollute water are allowed to continue this practice, but that they are required to be punished under the law to stop this practice. he pays, the polluter pays principle. That is the law that must be followed by the EMA, which is responsible for enforcement-environmental issues."Therefore, the EMA must make sure that people who are polluting the river will affect the water that will be used by those downstream. They should be caught by the EMA and be fined accordingly so that they do not continue to pollute those rivers, especially the Sakubva River because it affects health. of people and their animals, especially that of Nana Dora. Mrs. Alice Rutsvara works with the Environmental Management Agency, EMA, looking after the teaching and dissemination of information to this department. Mrs. Rutsvara says that she is worried about the pollution that is often done in the river Sakubva and she is warning that this should be stopped as well by warning those polluting the water that they will be fined. Some are said to be living by selling fish from Sakubva. Nevertheless, EMA has taken steps to continue to inspect these companies and work with the Mutare city council to close the leakages in the city by working on time to solve the burst sewer pipes. All this is against our Statutory Instrument Number 6 (Six) of 2007. One study shows that the sewage lines have been so old that they are no longer able to handle all the sewage coming from the houses and the growth of our city. .The former Mutare city spokesperson, Mr. Charles Sadondo, says that as a city, they are trying their best to reduce environmental pollution issues, including rivers as expected. But we often encourage residents and others around the city that if they come across issues like this, they should report to our various offices or use our City of Mutare platform Whatsapp 0775 792 461 so that we can solve similar problems, Mr. Sadondo says. The problem of river pollution that many say is not only in Dorapindo but the rivers that pass through cities and towns Many of the country's rivers are being heavily polluted by citizens, companies and municipalities, which leaves a health problem for those who live downstream of these rivers. Human rights activists and citizens' representatives say that until the government departments take appropriate measures to see how the municipalities and companies are conducting their work to reduce the pollution of water and communities, many citizens in the country, including from Dorapindo, they will continue to face the problems of using dirty water.')

instruction: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muSouth Africa, VaPercy Sithole, Votarisana neChikwereti Chikuru kuChipatara Kwavakarapwa('A Zimbabwean in South Africa, Mr. Percy Sithole, Faces Huge Debt to the Hospital Where He Was Treated')
output: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, nhasi tine nyaya inosiririsa, yaVaPercy Sithole vanobva kuChiredzi kuMasvingo asi pari zvino vari kugara kuSoshanguve muSouth Africa.VaSithole vanoti vakaitwa oparesheni yepachipfuva pachipatara cheDoctor George Mukhari Academic Hospital mwedzi wapera, vakagara pachipatara ichi kwemazuva manomwe vasati vaburitswa.Vakanzi vadzoke zvakare kuchipatara mwedzi uno kunotariswa kuona kuti vari kupora zvakanaka here asi vanoti vakashamisika pavakadzokera vachisvikotambirwa nechikwereti chemari inodarika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nezvipfumbamwe zvemaRand, kana kuti 99,544 Rand, (US$5,500.00) iyo yainzi vanofanirwa kutanga vabhadhara kuitira kuti vakwanise kutariswa zvakare.Mari inofanirwa kubhadharwa naVaSithole.Asi vanoti havana mari yakadaro uye havana kwavanotarisira kuiwana, izvo zvave kuita kuti vatadze kudzokera zvakare pachipatara ichi kunotariswa kana oparesheni yavo iri kupora zvakanaka.Tsamba yakabva kuchipatara ichi iyo yaonekwawo neStudio 7, inoratidza kuti VaSithole vakasainiswa magwaro ekuti vange vachibhadhara mari iyi kubva iye zvino, kukundikana kwavo votorerwa matanho.VaSithole vanoti vave kurwara vari kumba sezvo vari kushaya kana mari yekutenga mapiritsi nemishonga zvekuti vazvibatsire kuderedza marwadzo.Vanoti vari kukumbira vana veZimbabwe vanokwanisa kutambanudza maoko avo kuti vavabatsire nepavanokwanisa napo, vachiti chishuwo chavo chave chekuti dai vakwanisa kudzokera kumusha kune mhuri yavo, mudzimai nevana.Vanoda kubatsira VaSithole vanokwanisa kuvabata panharembozha dzavo dzinoti +27 643 394 191.('In our program where we look at what Zimbabwean children are doing abroad, today we have the sad story of Mr. Percy Sithole who is from Chiredzi in Masvingo but is currently living in Soshanguve in South Africa. they have been released. They were told to return to the hospital again this month to see if they are recovering well, but they said they were surprised when they returned to be greeted with a debt of more than 99,544 Rand, (US$5,500.00), which they were told to pay first in order to be able to be examined again. Money should be paid by Mr. Sithole. But they say they do not have that kind of money and they do not expect to get it, which has made it impossible for them to go back to the hospital to check if their operation is recovering well. A letter from the hospital, which was also seen by Studio 7, shows that Mr. Sithole has signed documents that he was paying this money from now on, their failure and action will be taken. He says that he is asking the children of Zimbabwe who are able to extend their hands to help them where they can, saying that their wish is to be able to go back He has his family, wife and children at home. Those who want to help Mr. Sithole can contact him on his mobile number +27 643 394 191.')

instruction: Vamwe Vabereki Vane Vana Vane Autism Vodzidzisa Veruzhinji Pamusoro peDambudziko Iri('Some Parents Who Have Children With Autism Are Educating The Public About This Problem')
output: Apo pasi rose riri kucherechedza mwedzi uno waKubvumbi unove mwedzi wekutambira kuvepo kwechirwere cheautism, weAutism Acceptance Month, vamwe vabereki vane vana vane chirwere ichi vanoti zvakakosha kuti pave nedzidziso pamusoro pedambudziko iri sezvo vazhinji munyika vasina ruzivo nezvaro.Mumwe mubereki ane mwana mudiki ane dambudziko iri, VaLuke Pencil, vanoti zvakatora nguva yakareba kuti vanachiremba vemunyika vavaudze kuti mwana wavo ane chirwere ichi, vachiti vakatozoziva mwana wavo ave nemakore manomwe.“Saka naizvozvo isusuwo nekurwadziwa kwatakanga taita nerwendo rwedu takatiwo aah, dambudziko iri idambudziko risiri kuzivikana munyika medubecausedzimwe nguva taienda muzvipatara vanachiremba navamukoti vasina kana ruzivo rwekuti mwana wedu ane dambudziko ripi.”Nekuda kwaizvozvo, VaPencil vanoti zvakavapa shungu yekuti vatange kudzidzisa vamwe vabereki pamusoro pechirwere ichi kuburikidza nedandemutande reFacebook papeji ravo rinonzi “Talking Autism in Zimbabwe,” senzira yekuti dambudziko iri ribude pachena.('While the world is observing the month of April, which is the month of accepting the existence of autism, of Autism Acceptance Month, some parents who have children with this disease say that it is important to have education about this problem as many people in the world do not know about it. One parent who has a young child with this problem, Mr. Luke Pencil said it took a long time for doctors in the country to tell him that his child had this disease, saying that they only found out about his child when he was seven years old. who have no idea what problem our child has. instruction: Masangano Akazvimirira Oronga Kushanda neHurumende Mukuvaka Nzvimbo dzeKubatsira Vanotora Zvinodhaka('Private Organizations Plan to Work with the Government in Building Centers to Help Drug Abusers')
output: Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Civil Liberties and Drug Network, VaWilson Box, vanoti sangano ravo nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira vachange vachibatana nehurumende mukuvaka nzvimbo dzinopa rubatsiro kune avo vari kutora zvinodhaka munzvimbo dzakasiyanasiyana munyika.VaBox vanoti pane hurukuro dziri kutoitwa pari zvino kuti izvi zvibudirire, vachiti pari zvino nzvimbo dzinobatsira vanotora zvinodhaka dziri kudhura uye ishoma munyika.Vanoti pari zvino mapurisa ari kuyedza kusunga vanotengesera vechidiki zvinodhaka asi chirongwa ichi chinoda kusimbaradzwa."Zvakakosha kuti mapurisa arambe achiita basa rawo rekusunga vanotengesa zvinodhaka, asi mitemo yekuti vanenge vabatwa vachitora zvinodhakwa vasungwe inofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti vawane simba rekuenda kunozvirapisa vasingatye kuguma vasungwa kana vaziva kuti vave nedambudziko rezvonodhaka," VaBox vaudza Studio 7.('The president of the Zimbabwe Civil Liberties and Drug Network, Mr. Wilson Box, says that his organization and other independent organizations will be working with the government to build centers that provide assistance to those who take drugs in various parts of the country. places that help drug addicts are expensive and there are few in the country. instruction: Mapurisa Oshushikana neNjodzi Dziri Kukonzerwa neVatyairi Kunyanya('Police Are Concerned About Accidents Caused By Motorists')
output: Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Comissioner Paul Nyathi vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nenjodzi dzemumigwagwa dziri kukonzerwa kazhinji nevatyairi vasiri kutevedzera mitemo nekumhanyisa motokari nemabhazi.Musi weChishanu neMuvhuro, vanhu makumi masere nevetanhatu vakakuvara mushure mekubheuka kwemabhazi maviri uye mumwe munhu akatsikwao nemotokari akafa.VaNyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachapa huwandu hwenjodzi dzakaitika pazororo reEaster mangwana. Asi ongororo yakaitwa nehofisi yemunyori mukuru weUnited Nations inonzi UN Secretary General’s Envoy for Road and Safety inoti vanhu vashanu vanofa pazuva muZimbabwe nekuda kwetsaona dzemumigwagwa.United Nations inoti pagore vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete kana kuti 1,35 millio vanofa pasi rose nekuda kwenjodzi dzemumigwagwa kunyanya muAfrica.Mutauriri wesangano revanofamba nemabhazi reZimbabwe Passengers Association, VaTafadzwa Goliati vaudza Studio 7 kuti kumhanyisa mabhazi mumigwagwa isinawo kugadzirwa zvakanaka kukanda vanhu mukanwa mamupere.('Police spokesperson Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi says they are very concerned about road accidents which are often caused by drivers who are not following the rules and speeding cars and buses. On Friday and Monday, 86 people were injured after two buses overturned and one person died when they were run over by a car. Mr. Nyathi told Studio 7 that they will give the number of the disasters that happened on the Easter holiday tomorrow. But a study conducted by the office of the Secretary General of the United Nations called the UN Secretary General's Envoy for Road and Safety says that five people die a day in Zimbabwe due to road accidents. The United Nations says that annually more than one million people or 1.35 million people die worldwide due to road accidents, especially in Africa The spokesperson of the Zimbabwe Passengers Association, Mr. Tafadzwa Goliati, told Studio 7 that running buses on roads that are not well-maintained is putting people in danger.')

instruction: Nhomba yeCholera Yoshomeka Apo Vanhu Vanodarika Bhiriyoni Pasi Rose Vari muNjodzi yeKutapurirwa Chirwere Ichi('Cholera Is In Decline As More Than A Billion People Around The World Are At Risk Of Infection')

VaRusike vati mushonga mukuru kupa vanhu mvura yakachena.('The World Health Organization says that it is very concerned about the reduction of cholera at a time when this disease is spreading in 30 countries in the world including Zimbabwe. The head of the Community Working Group on Health, Mr. Itai Rusike, says that the shortage of tuberculosis is not surprising because the drug manufacturers saw that the disease was less toxic.
